discrepancies.finding: Bill of Lading is not titled 'Marine Bill of Lading', 'Ocean Bill of Lading', or 'Port to Port Bill of Lading'
Bill of Lading is signed by Ocean Track, Inc. without indicating the capacity in which it has been signed or the name of the carrier
Bill of Lading does not indicate the name of the carrier identified as the carrier
Bill of Lading does not indicate the name and address of the delivery agent at the port of discharge
Bill of Lading does not indicate the actual place of shipment or destination
Bill of Lading does not indicate the country of shipment or destination
Bill of Lading does not indicate the number of originals issued

compliances.finding: Bill of Lading is signed in the form described in UCP 600 sub-article 20 a i
Bill of Lading indicates the date of shipment
Bill of Lading indicates the place of receipt and port of loading
Bill of Lading indicates the weight of the goods
